label: Seal
comment: A device used to secure an object and protect it from unauthorized entry or tampering during transport or other logistics operations.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the type of logistics seal.
The code specifying the role of the party responsible for the sealing of this logistics seal.
The maximum unique identifier used for these logistics seals.
A code specifying a condition of this logistics seal.

referencedBy.comment: A logistics seal affixed to this piece of associated transport equipment.
A seal required by this cross-border regulatory procedure.
